SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp

Class SMTPServerMetrics

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.SMTPServerMetrics
public class SMTPServerMetrics extends Object
OpenTelemetry metrics for SMTP servers.

This class provides standardized SMTP server metrics for monitoring mail transfer operations.

Metrics provided:

  • smtp.server.connections - Total number of SMTP connections
  • smtp.server.active_connections - Number of active connections
  • smtp.server.messages - Total messages received
  • smtp.server.message.size - Size of received messages in bytes
  • smtp.server.recipients - Recipients per message
  • smtp.server.session.duration - SMTP session duration in milliseconds
  • smtp.server.authentications - Authentication attempts
Author:
Chris Burdess

      Records a message received with status attribute.
      Parameters:
      sizeBytes - the message size in bytes
      recipientCount - the number of recipients
      accepted - true if the message was accepted, false if rejected
